CommandDefinition.Name: buildtriggerproject
CommandDefinition.Description: Create a trigger template to import in Eclipse.

Argument.Name: targetDirectory
Argument.Description: The path to which the template zip file is written. If this parameter is not provided and a CodeAccess is defined, the trigger will be added to the CodeAccess.

Argument.Name: triggerName
Argument.Description: The name for the new trigger, such that <name>Trigger makes sense, e.g. 'HTTP'
